headline: Corning’s Q1 Earnings Call: Our Top 5 Analyst Questions
summary: Corning’s first-quarter results surpassed Wall Street expectations, with management crediting robust adoption of its optical communications products, particularly those supporting generative AI (GenAI) data centers, as a primary growth engine. CEO Wendell Weeks emphasized that strong customer demand for new optical and solar products fueled double-digit sales growth, while recent price increases in the display segment contributed to improved operating margins.
